notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: E.F.M., P.T.B. and L.L. designed the study. E.F.M., E.C., F.A. and S.D. performed vector competence experiments. M.G. provided the dengue virus isolate and various reagents in support of the virological assays. S.M. provided the Ae. aegypti colony. C.O. and J.G.L. helped to design and perform the olfactometer experiments. E.F.M. and L.L. analyzed the data. E.F.M. and L.L. wrote the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
